title: Staring at the Light
description: A maverick London lawyer with an irresistible smile and a body to match, Sarah Fortune masks a numbed heart with a string of lame-dog clients and a retinue of eccentric lovers. Now she finds herself protecting Cannon Smith, a man whose worse enemy turns out to be his own beloved twin brother, Johnny. Long ago, the brothers were inseparable, but now they've taken different paths - and Johnny doesn't like that...not one bit.It's hard for Sarah to believe that a man could hate his brother so, but Johnnyboy is truly evil. Inflicting the worst kind of pain is his deepest pleasure and there is nothing he fears - except the dentist's chair.
author: Frances Fyfield
